sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove the duplicate "New" UI action on the Inputs embedded list of the Workflow Properties dialog. xml DELETE records for UI Action are not safe because the way the update manager coalesces them can result in future upgrades delete records you didn't want to get deleted.</description> <name>remove_duplicate_new_inputs_button</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_action"); if (gr.get("5218846ac58343958d3a3d3faeccdff1")) { gr.deleteRecord(); } })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>russ.sarbora</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-12-16 20:15:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>48d85a24533b2200566d435723dc3491</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>remove_duplicate_new_inputs_button</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Workflow Runtime Engine" source="com.glideapp.workflow">b6467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f4a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_48d85a24533b2200566d435723dc3491</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>russ.sarbora</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-12-16 21:42:06</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
